snippet.title: Battle Santa 64 (Special Christmas Mario Kart 64 battle mode rom hack)
snippet.description:
(Download link below)

Merry Christmas!  Battle Santa 64 is a special 2023 Christmas single player version of Battle Kart 64 (https://www.romhacking.net/hacks/5618/) that follows the tradition of the OverKart 64 Christmas Mod (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nM-kXa55EdE).

In Battle Santa 64, you play as Santa Claus trying to take back the presents stolen by Bowser, Wario, and Donkey Kong.  You have five minutes to collect as many as you can.  They will run away so you will need to chase them down, hit them, and pick up the presents they drop.  After five minutes you will see how many you have collected, what your high score is, and can restart by holding A and B simultaneously to try again.

Special thanks to DeadHamster and MtZuul for making this possible.

Download link: 
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1_Tte5cmnsm8fpYeQy4njAaerU-LwJngt/view?usp=sharing

Patch using a clean Mario Kart 64 (USA) rom using this online patcher: https://www.romhacking.net/patch/

=====================================================

Credits:

Triclon - Programming, game mode, bots, cutscene, testing, and debugging.

DeadHamster - Santa Claus model, present models and programming, Christmas Kimura logo, and bot AI paths.

MtZuul - Modifying Luigi's voice to be Santa and importing Up on a Housetop music.

Individual title screen assets created by Triclon using Bing image creator, assembled in Photoshop by DeadHamster.

Up on a Housetop Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

=====================================================


Check out my website: https://triclon.neocities.org

I usually hang out in the Overkart 64 discord: https://discord.gg/WgvAdFZ8N7​​​​
You can checkout the #battlekart64​​ channel there for the latest info on Battle Kart 64 and download the latest beta versions.

Check out the Overkart 64 channel for more Mario Kart 64 hacking and custom courses:   https://www.youtube.com/c/OverKart64%E2%80%8B%E2%80%8B%E2%80%8B%E2%80%8B
